abstracts.cdata!:
The Project aims to help prepare a
            pipeline of high priority projects suitable for financing by
            the Government and external donors. The project includes
            technical assistance for pre-investment planning,
            feasibility and engineering studies; consulting and advisory
            services; setting up of planning and preparation units as
            necessary; training of personnel; setting up of telex
            facilities; and procurement of equipment, vehicles and
            materials. As a result, this project should help Bhutan make
            more effective use of domestic and external resources for
            the development of its economy.
